Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kedzie/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Northbound 52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Harrison and Kedzie near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Harrison, Kedzie and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway and #84 Peterson Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway and 84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Broadway/Catalpa, due to police activity near Broadway/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway and #84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Broadway/Catalpa, due to police activity near Broadway/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway and over regular route.

Southbound buses will operate via Broadway, Hollywood, Sheridan, Foster, Broadway and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.
